page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER BILLINGSHURST
page.content: BILLINGSHURST HAS HAD A POLICE STATION SINCE THE BEGINNING OF THE CENTURY. IT CURRENTLY EMPLOYS ONE SERGEANT AND FOUR CONSTABLES USING ONE CAR,ONE MOTOR CYCLE AND A PEDAL CYCLE TO PATROL AN AREA COVERING 12.5 SQ. MILES. THE VILLAGE IS ALSO PATROLLED ON FOOT. INFORMATION RECEIVED FROM THE POLICE TELLS US THAT THE CRIME RATE FOR 1984 IS BROKEN DOWN AS FOLLOWS: BURGLARY 56,THEFT 32,AND CRIMINAL DAMAGE 15. A SCHOOL LIAISON OFFICER BASED AT HORSHAM COVERS THE BILLINGSHURST SCHOOLS. EMPHASIS IS NOW ON THE SENIOR SCHOOLS TO FOSTER A BETTER RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN POLICE AND YOUTH.
